query: CREATE TABLE trunc_f (col1 integer primary key)
expected: CREATE TABLE trunc_f (col1 INT PRIMARY KEY)

query: CREATE TABLE trunc_trigger_test (f1 int, f2 text, f3 text)
expected: CREATE TABLE trunc_trigger_test (f1 INT, f2 TEXT, f3 TEXT)

query: CREATE TABLE trunc_trigger_log (tgop text, tglevel text, tgwhen text, tgargv text, tgtable name, rowcount bigint)
expected: CREATE TABLE trunc_trigger_log (tgop TEXT, tglevel TEXT, tgwhen TEXT, tgargv TEXT, tgtable name, rowcount BIGINT)

query: CREATE FUNCTION trunctrigger() RETURNS trigger as $$ declare c bigint; begin execute 'select count(*) from ' || quote_ident(tg_table_name) into c; insert into trunc_trigger_log values (TG_OP, TG_LEVEL, TG_WHEN, TG_ARGV[0], tg_table_name, c); return null; end; $$ LANGUAGE plpgsql
expected: CREATE FUNCTION trunctrigger () RETURNS trigger AS $$ declare c bigint; begin execute 'select count(*) from ' || quote_ident(tg_table_name) into c; insert into trunc_trigger_log values (TG_OP, TG_LEVEL, TG_WHEN, TG_ARGV[0], tg_table_name, c); return null; end; $$ LANGUAGE plpgsql
INSERT INTO trunc_trigger_test VALUES (1, 'foo', 'bar'), (2, 'baz', 'quux')

query: CREATE TRIGGER t BEFORE TRUNCATE ON trunc_trigger_test FOR EACH STATEMENT EXECUTE PROCEDURE trunctrigger('before trigger truncate')
expected: CREATE TRIGGER t BEFORE TRUNCATE ON trunc_trigger_test EXECUTE FUNCTION trunctrigger('before trigger truncate')

query: SELECT count(*) as "Row count in test table" FROM trunc_trigger_test
expected: SELECT COUNT(*) AS "Row count in test table" FROM trunc_trigger_test
TRUNCATE TABLE trunc_trigger_test CONTINUE IDENTITY RESTRICT
TRUNCATE TABLE trunc_trigger_log CONTINUE IDENTITY RESTRICT

query: CREATE TRIGGER tt AFTER TRUNCATE ON trunc_trigger_test FOR EACH STATEMENT EXECUTE PROCEDURE trunctrigger('after trigger truncate')
expected: CREATE TRIGGER tt AFTER TRUNCATE ON trunc_trigger_test EXECUTE FUNCTION trunctrigger('after trigger truncate')

query: CREATE TABLE truncparted1 PARTITION OF truncparted FOR VALUES IN (1)

expected: TRUNCATE TABLE truncparted CONTINUE IDENTITY RESTRICT

query: CREATE FUNCTION tp_ins_data() RETURNS void LANGUAGE plpgsql AS $$ BEGIN INSERT INTO truncprim VALUES (1), (100), (150); INSERT INTO truncpart VALUES (1), (100), (150); END $$
expected: CREATE FUNCTION tp_ins_data () RETURNS void LANGUAGE plpgsql AS $$ BEGIN INSERT INTO truncprim VALUES (1), (100), (150); INSERT INTO truncpart VALUES (1), (100), (150); END $$

query: CREATE FUNCTION tp_chk_data(OUT pktb regclass, OUT pkval int, OUT fktb regclass, OUT fkval int) RETURNS SETOF record LANGUAGE plpgsql AS $$ BEGIN RETURN QUERY SELECT pk.tableoid::regclass, pk.a, fk.tableoid::regclass, fk.a FROM truncprim pk FULL JOIN truncpart fk USING (a) ORDER BY 2, 4; END $$
expected: CREATE FUNCTION tp_chk_data (OUT pktb regclass, OUT pkval INT, OUT fktb regclass, OUT fkval INT) RETURNS SETOF record LANGUAGE plpgsql AS $$ BEGIN RETURN QUERY SELECT pk.tableoid::regclass, pk.a, fk.tableoid::regclass, fk.a FROM truncprim pk FULL JOIN truncpart fk USING (a) ORDER BY 2, 4; END $$
